page.title: 14PEOPLE,DUNTIABOURNE,WINSTONE
page.content: All of the many people interviewed in the three villages agreed on several points,that they enjoyed living in the countryside for its beauty,peace and fresh air.They didn't like being snowed-in during winter.Many are retired but there are younger people moving into the area ,one who has recently moved to Leer is a Beekeeper and is setting up a thriving cottage industry.We were fortunate enough to meet in each of the three villages ladies who had lived there all their lives.They had seen many changes.The biggest was the connection of electricity and mains water supplies. They have adjusted to modern life and the gradually changing villages but look back with fond memories of yesteryear of fetes,garden parties,the now-closed village schools and fields where mushrooms could be picked .
